issue.title: theguardian.com
issue.body: fixes #126795

comment.body:
First of all, this rule doesn't work on my end (I have a different `message_id`), so I have checked this:
```
||sourcepoint.theguardian.com/index.html?message_id=$subdocument
```
and if this request is blocked (cookie notice is not accepted) then video doesn't work on my end.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/187609397-1e7f7b10-2e63-4ebe-8313-ca7dffbe72cb.png)

</details>

If I remove this rule and close cookie notice then video works correctly.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/187609468-257d65b6-19cf-4b0c-828c-060ec76c64d5.png)

</details>

I guess that it may depends on location.
